about_us.mission_description: St. Yared Academy is dedicated to promoting science, research, and education about the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church (EOTC). Our mission is realized by:
about_us.mission_point_1: - Creating a dynamic & accessible academy for the professional development of university graduates and all interested individuals.
about_us.mission_point_2: - Preserving and disseminating research results about the EOTC from various scientific research institutions.
about_us.mission_point_3: - Conducting research on the influence of EOTC on the environment, culture, art, welfare architecture, literature, philosophy, music, language, and national history.
about_us.mission_point_4: - Collecting, preserving, and restoring unique and valuable written heritage of EOTC through digital means and artifacts.
about_us.mission_point_5: - Creating an accessible learning environment for academics and interested individuals of all ages to provide knowledge and experiences about EOTC.

director.directors_role_description: The director leads the promotion of science, research, and education about the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church (EOTC).
director.activity_1: Creating a dynamic academy for professional development.
director.activity_2: Conducting research on EOTC's influence on culture and history.
director.activity_3: Preserving and restoring EOTC's written heritage.

location.academy_description: St. Yared Academy of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church is located in Germany e.V.

study_online.welcome: Welcome to the Study Online page!
study_online.language_description: Learn about the rich and diverse languages of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church from the comfort of your home.
study_online.literature_description: Explore the vast literature of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church online.
study_online.music_description: Discover the unique music of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church online.
